/messages/{id}/structure
/messages/{id}/parts

/messages/{id}
api_list.description: Retrieve message body. If it is a multipart message and if html type is available, html version will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: replace_inline_url_path
optional_parameters.description: Replace cid:content_id of inline attachments with the correct url to get them through this api. Default: true
